org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects

Annotation Type Retryable


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Retryable
    Marks a method as one to be wrapped with a RetryableAspect.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean doubleDelay
      Whether the delay should be doubled between tries.
      int maxTries
      Specifies the maximum number of tries.
      int retryDelayMillis
      Amount of time in milliseconds between retries.
      Class<? extends Throwable>[] retryOn
      Throwable types that the RetryableAspect will retry on.
      boolean throwCauseException
      Whether the root cause Exception should be thrown, or whether a generic Exception("Call failed n times") should be thrown.

    • Element Detail

      • retryOn

        public abstract Class<? extends Throwable>[] retryOn
        Throwable types that the RetryableAspect will retry on. An empty list indicates that the method call will be retried on ANY Throwable.
        Returns:
        the Throwable types.
        Default:
        {}

      • maxTries

        public abstract int maxTries
        Specifies the maximum number of tries.
        Returns:
        the maximum number of tries.
        Default:
        2

      • retryDelayMillis

        public abstract int retryDelayMillis
        Amount of time in milliseconds between retries.
        Returns:
        the amount of time in milliseconds.
        Default:
        0

      • doubleDelay

        public abstract boolean doubleDelay
        Whether the delay should be doubled between tries. The delay will reset to the original 'retryDelayMillis' values after a successful call or after 'maxTries' is reached.
        Returns:
        whether the delay should be doubled between tries.
        Default:
        false

      • throwCauseException

        public abstract boolean throwCauseException
        Whether the root cause Exception should be thrown, or whether a generic Exception("Call failed n times") should be thrown.
        Returns:
        if the root cause Exception should be thrown.
        Default:
        true
